programme.title: Mrs K
programme.desc: Mrs K is a story of a woman who gives everything that she has to protect her husband and daughter when enemies from her past come hunting her.(n)

programme.title: Turn Around
programme.desc: A university graduate, Wang Cheng-chung, has an internship in a rural primary school. He is prepared to leave after that, but meets with the Taiwan 921 earthquake.(n)

programme.title: Bad Genius
programme.desc: Lynn, a genius high school student who makes money by cheating in tests, receives a new task that leads her to set foot in Sydney, Australia. Lynn and her classmates have to deliver the test answers back.(n)

programme.title: Heartfall Arises
programme.desc: An officer from the special forces faces the most notorious criminal who is a legend in Hong Kong for killing Southeast Asia's top businessmen.(n)

programme.title: The White Storm 2 Drug Lords
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman tries to take down a drug kingpin that he used to work with, while a policeman tries to find justice without breaking the law.(n)

programme.title: For A Few Bullets
programme.desc: When a professional thief sees his lifetime goal of being the best being potentially realised in stealing a rare artifact, he finds himself entangled in a worldwide plot involving the Soviets, the Japanese and a band of outsiders. It's up to him and a special agent to save the world!(n)

programme.title: High Flash
programme.desc: Fisherman A-Hai is found dead by self-immolation during a protest led by newly-elected county Mayor Chen against Tonglian Petrochemical. The suspicious incident makes the headlines instantly.(n)

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. He assembles a group of children for a Latin dance competition. Can Yu teach them to dance?(n)

programme.title: The Adventurers
programme.desc: The world's top thieves join forces to pull off the heist of a lifetime. But when they find themselves pursued across Europe by a legendary French detective, they'll have to take their game to the next level.(n)

programme.title: 7 Years Of Night
programme.desc: A man dumps a girl's body in a lake after accidentally killing her with his car on a dark and foggy night. Her enraged father soon hatches an elaborate plan to find the perpetrator and take revenge.(n)

programme.title: Good Take, Too!
programme.desc: An omnibus of four short stories, each of them occurring in different corners of society, but all of which encompass the same themes: courage, determination, pursuance and hope.(n)

programme.title: Nozaki Shuhei - Auditor Of Bank
programme.desc: Nozaki receives a threatening phone call at the fire scene again. But he would never give up knowing the truth. The fight with Masahiko goes on. Masahiko forces him to resign.(n)

programme.title: The Cases II
programme.desc: If spirits are everywhere, how can we solve the problem if they take offense by us? To reveal the truth, a crew proceeds by inviting a paranormal master to arrange a banquet serving all the ghosts around a graveyard, a so-called "extreme land".(n)

programme.title: The Witness
programme.desc: Lu Xiao Xing is a rookie cop who goes to a night club to find her adoptive brother and bring him home to chastise him for getting expelled from school and pursuing a frivolous dream of being a singer. As they argue in the car, her brother sends the car flying off the overpass.(n)

programme.title: Haunted Hotel
programme.desc: A young couple enter a wrong hotel when they travel to Malaysia, and horrible things occur.(n)

programme.title: The Bravest Escort Group
programme.desc: This story takes place after the death of Wu Sangui. In order to send Chen Yuanyuan and her grandson to safety, a general commissions the help of the nation's best escort group to take on a mission of life and death.(n)

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Kill Mobile tells the story of seven long-time friends who play a party game in which everyone hands over their phones to reveal all their calls, texts and WeChat messages, opening a Pandora's box in the room.(n)

programme.title: Wonderful! Liang Xi Mei
programme.desc: Liang Xi Mei spends her time enjoying her retirement with her grandchildren and her two sons. The sons have grown up but still find themselves in unexpected trouble, and she will need to save her family.(n)

programme.title: Golden Job
programme.desc: A group of mercenaries come together to pull off an epic heist.(n)

programme.title: Sakura Guardian In The North
programme.desc: Tetsu Ezure escapes with her son from Sakhalin Island after the Soviet Union invades the area as she struggles to survive as a refugee in Abashiri City's extreme cold weather and famine.(n)

programme.title: Back To The Good Times
programme.desc: This is a heart-warming story of a family that has a lot of issues financially, emotionally and physically, but is filled with humour.(n)

programme.title: The Gangs, The Oscars, And The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Director Wenxi and producer BS are two friends trying to make a zombie movie. With insufficient money, they join a local gang to make some extra cash. One day, their big boss Brother Long decides to invest in the movie project.(n)

programme.title: One Cut Of The Dead
programme.desc: Things go badly for a hack director and film crew shooting a low-budget zombie movie in an abandoned World War II Japanese facility, when they are attacked by real zombies.(n)

programme.title: Lucid Dreams
programme.desc: An episodic film in which the director recounts four of his own dreams.(n)

programme.title: All's Well End’s Well
programme.desc: There is a website where men sign up as volunteers for women who need assistance, in return for a hug. Carl helps Chelsia to revive her career. Ken becomes the model for photographer Julie. Hugo guides Charmine in her first taste of love. By helping, they find the missing pieces of their lives too.(n)

programme.title: Nozaki Shuhei - Auditor Of Bank
programme.desc: Nozaki is on the fence. If he announces that he knows the "G1 Plan", the bank would suffer.Shortly, the shareholders' meeting comes over.(n)

programme.title: House Of Fury
programme.desc: Teddy Yu appears to be just a Chinese chiropractor and widowed father. His son Nicky and daughter Natalie learn kung-fu from him, but the two kids are always skeptical of Teddy's claim of having a hidden life as a guardian for secret agents in the past. One day, Teddy gets kidnapped.(n)

programme.title: Wong Ka Yan
programme.desc: In 1992, youngster Chan Chun Yin starts a difficult quest to find Wong Ka Yan, a ticket taker at a local movie theatre whom he had fallen instantly in love with. Unfortunately, before Chun Yin could confess his love, Wong Ka Yan had quit her job and left without a trace.(n)

programme.title: Brother Of The Year
programme.desc: Jane lives with her brother Chut, with her being the only one doing everything around the house. But Chut will need to learn to take care of himself when Jane is about to get married and move to Japan.(n)

programme.title: The Gangs, The Oscars, And The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Director Wenxi and producer BS are two friends trying to make a zombie movie. With insufficient money, they join a local gang to make some extra cash. One day, their big boss Brother Long decides to invest in the movie project.(n)

programme.title: Operation Red Sea
programme.desc: The PLA Navy Marine Corps launch a hostage rescue operation in Ihwea and undergo a fierce battle with rebellions and terrorism.(n)

programme.title: The Promise ()
programme.desc: Ib and Boum decide to commit suicide together in Bangkok in 1997. After reneging on her promise, the vengeful ghost of Ib returns 20 years later to haunt Boum and her 15-year-old daughter, Bell.(n)

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: William Luk goes undercover as a prisoner to investigate correctional officers who are receiving bribes.(n)

programme.title: The Mysterious Family
programme.desc: A young girl was raped by a weird stranger, and her parents and elder brothers were all killed months later. She survives and tries to find out the truth behind the massacre.(n)

programme.title: When Ghost Meets Zombie
programme.desc: An expressionless zombie allows a free-spirited female ghost to possess him so she can use his body to enter a male beauty pageant.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - Final Round
programme.desc: One night while driving a taxi, former boxer Ma inadvertently rescues Yu Qing, a pregnant nightclub hostess, from a dangerous gangster. They run away and move constantly in order to stay hidden from the underworld. But their past eventually catches up to them.(n)

programme.title: Cook Up A Storm
programme.desc: A Cantonese street cook and his chief rival, a French-trained Michelin-starred chef, discover they have a lot in common as they prepare for a world-famous culinary competition.(n)

programme.title: We Are Champions
programme.desc: Born into the bottom rungs of society, two teenage brothers with nothing but each other hope to change their fate through their love of basketball. Eventually, the brothers cross paths on their way to ultimate basketball glory - the HBL championship.(n)

programme.title: The Lion Men: Ultimate Showdown
programme.desc: Having witnessed Mikey and Babyface's performance at the first leg of the lion dance competition, and finding out about Mikey's feelings for Xiao Yu, Shi Shen begins to see him as a rival. To prepare for the final leg of the competition, Shi Shen throws himself into practice, neglecting Xiao Yu.(n)

programme.title: Nozaki Shuhei - Auditor Of Bank
programme.desc: The news of the three banks' merging in Japan is announced. Masahiko is much more keen on his M&A plan. Under this circumstance, Nozaki decides to defeat him.(n)

programme.title: Fantasia
programme.desc: Featuring an all-star Hong Kong cast, 2004 Lunar New Year comedy Fantasia invites you to cascades of laughter in 1970s Hong Kong. Louis Koo, Lau Ching Wan, and Jordan Chan, donning 70s Hui brothers hair, play bumbling private detectives who discover a magic lamp.(n)

programme.title: All My Goddess
programme.desc: Four ladies, Eileen, Zhou Li Jun, Chen Ruo Yan and Zhang Jia Xin were colleagues as stewardesses 10 years ago. They are reunited at Jia Xin's wedding and gather in a resort in Penang. The friends are introduced to the bridegroom Gary, a Prince Charming look-alike.(n)

programme.title: Memory Eclipse - Final Round
programme.desc: One night while driving a taxi, former boxer Ma inadvertently rescues Yu Qing, a pregnant nightclub hostess, from a dangerous gangster. They run away and move constantly in order to stay hidden from the underworld. But their past eventually catches up to them.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Boy
programme.desc: Lucky Boy chronicles several decades of the lives of Lin Yu and Qingqing, the girl whom he fell in love with in primary school and continues pining for throughout his tumultuous and eventful life.(n)

programme.title: Jump Ashin!
programme.desc: Ashin grew up in Yilan County during the 1980s as the elder of two sons raised by a single mother. As a child, Ashin's natural agility drew him to start practising with the school's gymnastics team, but his mother expected him to be more involved in the family fruit stand business.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple
programme.desc: As Sarah's mother has to relocate to China on a work assignment, she has to turn to her estranged father back in Malaysia. To a 12-year-old contemporary youngster like Sarah, Malaysia seems like her worst nightmare come true.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: High schooler Nard is in a relationship with Mac. When Nard gets pregnant, her mother persuades her to abort the baby. However, Nard dies during the abortion, haunting the apartment complex.(n)

programme.title: Super Express
programme.desc: A modest super-express delivery courier gets entangled in a spiral of adventure and romance in Shanghai.(n)

programme.title: A Journey Of Happiness
programme.desc: Hoping to fix her family's relationship, Siew Chen takes her father and brothers on a trip to Malaysia, where they fall into an unforgettable journey.(n)

programme.title: Ace Of Sales
programme.desc: Sue takes on a sales job at a hypermarket. Her terrible promoting skill gains her atrocious sales and mocking from her senior, Mei. Fortunately, she meets a triad boss, Jack, who teaches her a sales technique that eventually transforms her.(n)

programme.title: To The Fore
programme.desc: A professional cycling team moves with speed and power. Race after race, the storied Radiant team, led by the brilliant Korean attacker Zheng Zhi Yuan, has become the virtual enemy of all cycling teams.(n)

programme.title: SPL2 A Time For Consequences
programme.desc: Undercover cop Kit becomes a junkie in order to catch Mr Hung. When the operation goes sour and Kit blows his cover, his supervisor and uncle, Wah, decides to terminate the operation. When Kit disappears without a trace, Wah tracks Kit to a prison in Thailand.(n)

programme.title: Good Times, Bed Times
programme.desc: Bored judge Raymond indulges himself in one-night stands and flirtations, causing his girlfriend Ah Qiu to leave him. Ah Qiu, a journalist, doesn't lose any time in falling in love with Keung, a super-cop she is sent to interview.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Wife
programme.desc: High schooler Nard is in a relationship with Mac. When Nard gets pregnant, her mother persuades her to abort the baby. However, Nard dies during the abortion, haunting the apartment complex.(n)

programme.title: Ace Of Sales
programme.desc: Sue takes on a sales job at a hypermarket. Her terrible promoting skill gains her atrocious sales and mocking from her senior, Mei. Fortunately, she meets a triad boss, Jack, who teaches her a sales technique that eventually transforms her.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple 2
programme.desc: The sequel to the critically-acclaimed The Kid From The Big Apple. Sarah is back in Malaysia to spend her holiday with grandpa, who is showing signs of dementia.(n)

programme.title: Zombiepura
programme.desc: When a mysterious virus breaks out in an isolated army camp, a lazy reservist soldier and his tough commander must work together to survive, and learn what it means to be real soldiers.(n)

programme.title: Lee Chong Wei
programme.desc: A biopic on Malaysia's badminton icon Datuk Wira Lee Chong Wei, starting with his early years as an aspiring young badminton player from Bukit Mertajam, all the way to becoming a world champion.(n)

programme.title: Make It Big Big
programme.desc: This reality comedy delves into the secret lives of the leading four radio-presenters, detailing how these celebrities deal with living in the public eye, meeting the daily expectations of their fans and their personal issues.(n)

programme.title: When Sun Meets Moon
programme.desc: Like the sun and the moon, this couple can hardly see each other despite living in the same city, but their love endures amidst separation and opposition from Moon's mother.(n)

programme.title: Get Outta Here
programme.desc: Lucky for everyone involved, Joe doesn't like to drink human blood, and he forms a bond with his new flat mates. However, other vampires do lurk in Hong Kong, and they soon side with the greedy land developers angling for Apple's flat.(n)

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars as a hardened special forces agent who fights to protect a young woman from a sinister criminal gang. At the same time, he feels a special connection to the young woman, like they had met in a different life.(n)

programme.title: Shed Skin Papa
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck man is tasked with taking care of his elderly father, only to discover that the man is shedding a layer of skin every day, making him younger in the process.(n)

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: A girl ends up at an abandoned building while playing an augmented reality game. She wins the game and takes a photo to commemorate her win. Later, she realises there is a mysterious girl in the photo she has taken. Worse, the mystery girl is now haunting her.(n)

programme.title: One Night Only
programme.desc: Having lost all his fortune and loved ones from gambling, Gao Ye walks out from prison to an even crueler world. Intrigued by a beautiful hooker who approaches him for unknown reason, he comes up a master plan to redeem everything he once had, but things spin wildly out of control.(n)

programme.title: The Kid From The Big Apple
programme.desc: As Sarah's mother has to relocate to China on a work assignment, she has to turn to her estranged father back in Malaysia. To a 12-year-old contemporary youngster like Sarah, Malaysia seems like her worst nightmare come true.(n)

programme.title: Lokah Laqi
programme.desc: In a secluded indigenous tribe, three kids grow up in the mountains. They are all very optimistic, yet they are also troubled by their own family issues. One day, the three kids find a tape of their teacher's recording and are amazed by her voice. They decide to bring this tape to Taipei.(n)

programme.title: Heaven In The Dark
programme.desc: Marco and Michelle cross paths at a party. Both deeply hurt by the past, the two confront each other, reopening old wounds in search for reason. The two grow increasingly close and one drunken night, they share a kiss. Soon after, Michelle sues Marco for sexual harassment.(n)

programme.title: Call Of Heroes
programme.desc: During the warlords era in China, a village located in rural area called Pucheng falls into danger when the cruel commandant Cao from the enemy troops arrives and kills the innocent. The guardians of Pucheng are desperate to fight against Cao and protect their homeland.(n)

programme.title: Viral
programme.desc: A girl ends up at an abandoned building while playing an augmented reality game. She wins the game and takes a photo to commemorate her win. Later, she realises there is a mysterious girl in the photo she has taken. Worse, the mystery girl is now haunting her.(n)

programme.title: The Rope Curse
programme.desc: Hoping to make a viral video by streaming a mysterious rope ritual, a couple falls into a deadly curse instead that turns their lives upside down.(n)

programme.title: Meow
programme.desc: Alien life-form from a faraway planet has been residing on Earth for thousands of years. They transform themselves into cats and populate every area of the globe.(n)

programme.title: Assassination
programme.desc: Yeom Seok-Jin is an agent from the interim government. He plans out an assassination plot and gives order to An Ok-Yoon. An Ok-Yoon is a deadly sniper and she works with Soksapo and Hwang Deok-Sam. She takes on the mission due to her strong desire to see Korea's independence.(n)

programme.title: The Lingering
programme.desc: A village woman in an aged family house has a husband who works in the city and a son who wants to leave for the city. One day, she is told that her husband has passed away in an accident. But he re-appears.(n)

programme.title: Huat The Fish
programme.desc: This story revolves around the lives of four fishermen who are buddies from a fishing village at Pulau Ketam. In order to settle a huge loan, the four buddies decide to venture into robbery. In their attempt, the four buddies crash into a real robbery scene.(n)

programme.title: The House That Never Dies II
programme.desc: During the last years of the Republic, the country was in chaos. With the warlords' mutiny in the capital, Marshal Zhang Zhisheng was forced to marry the great warlord's daughter Ji Jincui.(n)

programme.title: Mon Mon Mon Monsters
programme.desc: Lin Shu-wei is assigned to do community service alongside some bullies. As the gang of bullies progressively accept him as one of their own, Lin partakes in their misdeeds. During a night out, the group stumble upon a pair of flesh-eating female ghouls and capture one of them.(n)

programme.title: A Hearty Response
programme.desc: Kong-sang is a mainland Chinese girl who illegally enters Hong Kong, hoping to retrieve her birth certificate which proves that she was actually born in Hong Kong. She flees from her smuggler Shing after she injures him.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China II
programme.desc: Wong Fei-Hung faces Kung, a mercenary rival with skills to equal his own. In addition, Canton is convulsed by a struggle between the local representatives of the Chinese government and Europeans who want to control China, and Wong ends up in the middle of this fight.(n)

programme.title: Gimme Gimme
programme.desc: A group of high school students are wise beyond their years regarding sex and drugs, yet tenderly innocent when it comes to matters of the heart.(n)

programme.title: Working Class
programme.desc: A factory worker falls in love unknowingly with his boss' daughter. However, on their first date, he vows never to marry a rich girl.(n)

programme.title: The Return Of Pom Pom
programme.desc: Two detectives and best buddies investigate how the inspector is framed by a master thief. They accidentally meet the thief's daughter.(n)

programme.title: Life After Life
programme.desc: Wooden puppets linked to an old murder turn out to have a weird connection with designer George Lam and model Flora Cheung.(n)

programme.title: Affectionately Yours
programme.desc: Alan Tam is conned into a marriage by Eric Tsang, who wants to take over his flower shop. Then, Alan meets a girl of his dreams.(n)

programme.title: The Legend Of Wisely
programme.desc: Working in Nepal, science fiction writer and adventurer Wisely is enlisted by enigmatic billionaire Howard Hope to locate the former's childhood friend, David Ko. The diminutive David steals an oversized golden Dragon Pearl from a group of Buddhist monks.(n)

programme.title: Teaching Sucks
programme.desc: Anthony Wong and Jan Lamb are unenthusiastic teachers, until new colleague Cathy Tsui rekindles their interest in school and life.(n)

programme.title: Double Tap
programme.desc: What begins as an innocuous entry into a gun competition eventually steers Rick towards a path of fatal rivalry. Four members of a G4 unit have been murdered; the suspects clear out any possible evidence. A top CID officer, Miu, narrows the suspect list down to Rick.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Cheung San turns Fan Yan into a vampire at death's door. The Demon Star is born. Domoto Sei gets hold of Jan Jan and beats her to near death. Tin Yau wants Jan Jan to become a vampire, but she refuses.(n)

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow III
programme.desc: A prequel to A Better Tomorrow, Chow Yun-Fat stars as a younger Mark on a mission to get a friend out of Vietnam. He runs up against Ho, a local crime lord. Along the way he also meets Kit, a female gangster who helps the naive young Mark become a highly-capable gunman.(n)

programme.title: Code Of Honour
programme.desc: Ho Chen-Tung is an aging mob boss in Hong Kong living by a code of honour, keeping peace among rival factions. For years he has been estranged from his son Hui. Just as Hui reaches out to his father, the Hong Kong CID conclude their years-long effort to get the goods on Tung and his associates.(n)

programme.title: Kiss Me Goodbye
programme.desc: A romance between aspiring musician Anthony Wong Yiu-ming and girlfriend Loletta Lee, whose dreams of stardom threaten to tear them apart.(n)

programme.title: Crying Heart
programme.desc: Mrs. Fat is slowly succumbing to cancer, but her biggest worry is her only child, 30-year-old Bee. Possessing the mind of a toddler but the hormonal urges of a sexually-aroused rhino, Bee finds himself in trouble with the gangster boyfriend of his neighbour May.(n)

programme.title: All About Ah Long
programme.desc: Chow Yun-fat plays Ah-Long, a single father trying to raise his son, Porky. Ah-Long works as a truck driver at a construction site. The son's real mother, Por-por, had left Ah-Long 10 years ago for the United States after a lovers' spat.(n)

programme.title: The Lunatics
programme.desc: Three years ago, Fan Kwok Sang accidentally killed his wife during a schizophrenic episode. Since then, he's been receiving treatment from Dr. Chow Ming Kit whilst under confinement at a psychiatric hospital. Convinced that Fan's been cured, Chow is now advocating for his release.(n)

programme.title: Set Up
programme.desc: Moon, a writer, is about to marry a businessman. Before her wedding day, she undergoes an eye surgery, which causes her blindness for three days. While she stays in her new house with her sister Yan, she experiences the real pre-marital anxiety when three robbers break into her house!(n)

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Uncle Tak, an old martial arts master, has severe problems with his former student Jonny, who wants nothing more than to kill his old master to show everyone who the real master is. Uncle Tak wants Jet, his best student, to come over from China to the US.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places
programme.desc: King Kong is a burglar who makes off with a fortune in diamonds. Inspector "Hot Tongue" Ho leads the Hong Kong cops in apprehending him, but the higher-ups call in legendary detective Kodojak, who charms Ho and persuades King Kong to partner them to take down evil jewel thief White Glove.(n)

programme.title: Saga Of The Phoenix
programme.desc: The Holy Maiden of Hell, Ashura possesses immense power that can destroy humanity. Buddhist monks trap her in a deep cave to keep her from falling into evil hands. Kind-hearted Abbot Jiku grants her wish to enjoy the human world for seven days.(n)

programme.title: Happy Ghost III
programme.desc: The spirit of late female singer Tsui Pan Han waits in the afterlife to be reincarnated. She meets the Godfather who has found an appropriate family for her to be reincarnated with. Her opportunity to be born into the family is ruined when Sam Kwai takes his pregnant wife to the wrong hospital.(n)

programme.title: Dr. Wai In The Scripture With No Words
programme.desc: The Scripture With No Words had been lost for a long time, and everybody is eager to find it. Dr. Wai, a former antiquarian, goes to Shanghai trying to locate The Scripture With No Words and discovers that it is in the possession of the leader of Gang of Salt.(n)

programme.title: Rouge
programme.desc: The ghost of a courtesan who died in 1934 returns to Hong Kong 53 years later, seeking to reunite with the man she loved.(n)

programme.title: Last Ghost Standing
programme.desc: On New Year's Eve before 2000, the cinema on 666 King's Road presents its last show before closure. A horrible, gory bloodbath starts out, including a soccer match with a decapitated head and a nasty monster.(n)

programme.title: One Husband Too Many
programme.desc: A romantic comedy in which Kenny Bee and Anthony Chan, recently dumped by wives Anita Mui and Pat Ha, both fall for Cherie Chung.(n)

programme.title: The Champions
programme.desc: Country boy Lee Tong has the knack of getting into trouble with great regularity. This time, he has to beat it all the way to the city, and the first thing that happens to him in the city is to have his pocket picked.(n)

programme.title: Teppanyaki
programme.desc: Mr. Wong is the chief chef in his father-in-law's teppanyaki restaurant. One day, he meets his dream girl, Sissy. He starts chasing her and arranges for a tour to the Paradise Island with her. Unfortunately, his wife and her friend go with him.(n)

programme.title: Chasing Girls
programme.desc: Robert, a typical playboy, finally finds his true love with an ordinary waitress after so many so-called love experiences.(n)

programme.title: Perfect Exchange
programme.desc: Mindy Chan is a top-notched gambler and swindler. His girlfriend Lily and friend Ah Chi are card dealers at the casino where bad guy Lau and his mistress Mona frequent. During a card game, Ah Chi and Mindy swindle millions of dollars from Lau, but they are caught.(n)

programme.title: To Err Is Humane
programme.desc: A comedy of errors ensues when Sammo Hung tries to kidnap his boss but ends up with Joey Wang, who is then snatched by Kenny Bee.(n)

programme.title: Double Fattiness
programme.desc: Siu Fung, an owner of a pizzeria, unexpectedly succumbs to a heart attack. However, her spirit was unable to cross over to the other side, thus she resurrects into the body of a young woman.(n)

programme.title: Himalaya Singh
programme.desc: Singh is born and raised in the Himalayas. A naive yoga master, he is ordered by his parents to join a competition hosted by the King of Yoga to fight for the king's daughter. On his way, Singh meets Tally, who falls for him.(n)

programme.title: The Saint Of Gamblers
programme.desc: Blackie Tat looks for a new Saint of Gamblers, and finds him in the form of a dim-witted mainlander.(n)

programme.title: Lost In Time
programme.desc: Sui Wai lost her fiance Ah Man in a car accident. With the obligations of life sitting heavy on her shoulders, she lives on. Dai Fai, a driver who witnessed Ah Man's death, is always there offering her support, yet he also lives in the shadow of his last relationship.(n)

programme.title: Doctor's Heart
programme.desc: Mark Cheng is a surgical intern involved in a love triangle with senior doctor Simon Yam and his girlfriend Michelle Reis.(n)

programme.title: 3 Days Of A Blind Girl
programme.desc: Mrs. Ng is left temporarily blind after an operation. The second day, her husband takes off to Macau for a few days. Soon afterwards Sam, a former patient, shows up with sinister motives.(n)

programme.title: The Magic Touch
programme.desc: In this sci-fi comedy, Michael Hui plays a fortune-telling con-artist who turns out to really be able to "see the future". The Magic Touch features some early performances of pop star Leon Lai and comedian Dayo Wong.(n)

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Wah is an unkempt, uneducated guy who is doomed to be a loser in love. Bok Ping is a stylish Shanghai girl with a tycoon father. Bok Ping decides to go to Hong Kong to seek her mother. She encounters Wah in the process and lives a simple life with Wah's mother.(n)

programme.title: The Ghost Informer
programme.desc: Fire Unicorn was killed by Tei Po. The spirit of Fire Unicorn discovers there would be an illegal transaction among the gangsters, and informs inspector Tang about this clue. After a fight between the police and gangsters, the whole gang, including Tei-po, is captured.(n)

programme.title: The Top Bet
programme.desc: Anita Mui plays the sister of the Saint of Gamblers, and she also possesses supernatural gambling abilities. However, she chooses not to use her powers. She decides to come to Hong Kong to retrieve her brother and bring him back to China.(n)

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Lucky Stars
programme.desc: A police informant sends a letter containing sensitive information on an illegal drug operation to his friend, Yi-Ching. The informant is assassinated by the drug lord's henchmen and, to cover up their operation, they attempt to eliminate Yi-Ching and double-agent Lau.(n)

programme.title: Long And Winding Road
programme.desc: Leslie and Tony, two bachelors, are bosom friends. Leslie is a wandering soul who seems unable to settle down. Tony is a frustrated musician and a part-time worker at an elderly home. He doesn't like old people, but works there only to get close to his dream girl Wai.(n)

programme.title: Point Of No Return
programme.desc: Policeman Lau wants to avenge his partner's death, and tracks down eyewitness Fat Goose.(n)

programme.title: Happy Go Lucky ()
programme.desc: A blind woman, a mentally-impaired man and a man with a nervous disorder form a friendship in this inspirational tale.(n)

programme.title: Picture Of A Nymph
programme.desc: An atmospheric tale of ghost Joey Wang who hides in a portrait to evade an evil demon, with warrior Yuen Biao coming to the rescue.(n)

programme.title: 92 The Legendary La Rose Noire
programme.desc: A movie hero of the 60s called Black Rose was actually real, and a woman in the 90s is mistaken for her because she's in the wrong place at the wrong time.(n)

programme.title: Moon Stars & Sun
programme.desc: Chu, a young lady, is forced by her abusive father to sell her virginity. Far more experienced are Gigi, a lady who does what she must to spring her convict husband from prison, and Porsche, an ageing call girl still clinging to the hope of finding true love.(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Wife
programme.desc: A playboy lawyer decides to settle down, and finds a girl from China to have a makeover and become the perfect wife.(n)

programme.title: Dreams Of Glory, A Boxer's Story
programme.desc: Two up-and-coming young fighters struggle to reach the top of their sport and survive the difficulties of life outside the ring.(n)

programme.title: The Other Side Of Gentleman
programme.desc: Alan Tam falls for Brigitte Lin, not knowing she's merely using him for a psychological experiment conducted by her fiance.(n)

programme.title: The Sword
programme.desc: The Sword is a 1980 wuxia film starring Adam Cheng and directed by Patrick Tam. A swordsman and a samurai work together to find a blade.(n)

programme.title: Eighth Happiness
programme.desc: This comedy tells the story of three brothers - the mincingly effeminate Fang Chien Lang, cartoonist Chien Sang, and their middle-aged older sibling, Chien Hui.(n)

programme.title: Dreadnaught
programme.desc: A violent criminal named White Tiger is on the run from the police and joins a theatre troupe to hide out, killing anyone who suspects his identity. One person he unsuccessfully tries to kill several times is a cowardly laundry man named Mousy.(n)

programme.title: Happy Ghost V
programme.desc: When a dog saves Happy Ghost (now working in a pet store) and his shrine from burning, the reward is to have a temporary human form.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Ding Dong asks Cheung San to save Demon Star. Cheung San is able to take Demon Star from Domoto Sei before Siu Ling kills him. Domoto Sei returns to good, using his last breath to give everyone a good dream.(n)

programme.title: It's A Mad Mad Mad World 2
programme.desc: The Biu family's luck changes as Bill's job promotion and his daughters' education and work send the entire family to lead their new lives in Canada, where new misadventures await.(n)

programme.title: Pa Pa Loves You
programme.desc: Ying is a single parent who's having a tough time disciplining his wild daughter Ellen. When Ying is mistaken to be the famous gangster hero, he gains recognition among Ellen's gangster classmates.(n)

programme.title: Security Unlimited
programme.desc: This film is about the misadventures of three employees of a private security company in Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: How To Be A Billionaire
programme.desc: Raymond Wong is a country bumpkin who learns the secret to fame and fortune, but finds that being rich isn't all it's cracked up to be.(n)

programme.title: I Do ()
programme.desc: Ann returns from US and is advised by her rich father to live by herself. She works at a florist and falls for Ball, who is not wealthy.(n)

programme.title: Three (3) Wishes
programme.desc: A century ago, Blackheart Ghost was known for his kindness, but he also caused the world to become unbalanced between good and evil.(n)

programme.title: Farewell China
programme.desc: Set primarily in New York City, the film revolves around Zhou who follows his wife's journey to America, and the tough surprises in store for him in the "Promised Land".(n)

programme.title: The Legend Of Zu
programme.desc: Between the heaven and the earth exists the Zu's mountain range, where live the immortals of Omei. The kingdom is in danger from Amnesia, a renegade immortal who wants to rule Zu and the entire world.(n)

programme.title: Police Story 3 Super Cop
programme.desc: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.(n)

programme.title: To Be Number One
programme.desc: This is the story of Ho, a Chinese peasant and slave worker who escapes to Hong Kong and becomes one of the most feared crime bosses in Hong Kong.(n)

programme.title: Haunted Office
programme.desc: A newly-hired employee gets the shock of her life upon entering the bathroom stall that her co-workers avoid at all costs. The shocks keep coming when handsome suitor Ken realises that one of the women he's pursuing may not be what she seems.(n)

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: John Woo's first action film is a tale of CIA-recruited commandos battling drug lords in the Golden Triangle.(n)

programme.title: When Fortune Smiles
programme.desc: The head of a rich family dies and in his will leaves his fortune to his daughter. His son is enraged and uses a rubbish collector who resembles his sister to steal the fortune.(n)

programme.title: United We Stand
programme.desc: Coach Wong is in charge of a girls' summer track training programme. Though the girls are initially skeptical of Wong's abilities, she earns their respect by beating them in a race every time.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Tin Yau wanders in the bar all the time after Jan Jan dies. Siu Ling and Mimi start a brawl in Ding Dong's bar. Everyone is ignorant of Nino's rapid growth. When Nino leaves the bar, he bumps into a giant dragon.(n)

programme.title: Truant Heroes
programme.desc: The war against organised crime in Hong Kong has opened a new front - the school. Police Commandant Wong orders Officer Kin to go undercover as a school teacher.(n)

programme.title: A Family Affair
programme.desc: Two cute kids plot to reunite parents Sam Hui and Olivia Cheng.(n)

programme.title: Mismatched Couples
programme.desc: Donnie Yen stars in this comedy about dancing, directed by and co-starring Master Yuen Wo Ping of the Matrix fame.(n)

programme.title: Tiger On Beat
programme.desc: Michael Chao, young and agile, is a new recruit in the police force. Francis Lee, an experienced cop, is lazy and frivolous. They are assigned to work on a murder case. Because of some misunderstanding and clash of personalities, the two are caught in a series of hilarious situations.(n)

programme.title: Long Arm Of The Law 2
programme.desc: Suspecting that a mastermind is behind a sudden crime wave, the Royal Hong Kong Police Force sends in three undercover cops to bust the crime ring.(n)

programme.title: Changing Partner
programme.desc: Wong and Sandra are assigned to be the bait to trap Ripper, a killer.(n)

programme.title: Always On My Mind
programme.desc: Michael is a money-grubbing news anchor who's just discovered that he has cancer. The TV station he works at is also looking to fire him. Before the station has a chance to finalise the firing, though, the news anchor finds fame overnight thanks to his coverage of a sensational robbery.(n)

programme.title: Once Upon A Time In China
programme.desc: Set in late 19th-century Canton, this film depicts the stance taken by martial arts hero Wong Fei-Hung against foreign forces' plundering of China. When Aunt Yee arrives back from America totally westernised, Wong Fei-Hung assumes the role of her protector.(n)

programme.title: Crime Story
programme.desc: Inspector Eddie Chan is a brilliant but emotionally-troubled cop assigned to protect a real-estate mogul threatened with kidnapping. Unfortunately he's unable to prevent the abduction. Eddie is paired with cop Hung to track the kidnappers to Taiwan, but things seem to work against them.(n)

programme.title: Brief Encounter In Shinjuku
programme.desc: Ultimate yuppie Lawrence Cheng is caught between wife DoDo Cheng and secretary Rosamund Kwan in this witty comedy.(n)

programme.title: Game Of Death ()
programme.desc: Legendary screen icon Bruce Lee stars as Billy Lo, a burgeoning martial arts star drawn into a web of corruption. On the verge of becoming a martial arts screen star, Billy Lo is approached by an evil group called The Syndicate to join their illicit endeavours. What will Billy do?(n)

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy
programme.desc: A man is hired to look after a spoiled rich girl, but is then pulled into a scheme meant to re-evaluate her life.(n)

programme.title: Why Why Tell Me Why
programme.desc: Anita Mui learns that mahjong and romance don't mix in a comedy where she must curb her mahjong addiction to get Anthony Chan.(n)

programme.title: House On Wheels
programme.desc: Sung Dong-il, Kim Hee-won and Yeo Jin-goo build a tiny, portable home and travel with it around Korea, bringing only essential belongings to live a minimal and green lifestyle.(n)

programme.title: I-LAND Part.2
programme.desc: Don't miss Part 2 of Big Hit Entertainment's audition project 'I-LAND', and witness the birth of the next generation's K-POP group!(n)

programme.title: Flower Of Evil
programme.desc: A psychopath falsifies everything about his cruel past to marry his wife. However, his secrets are soon revealed after his wife, a detective, doubts him as a suspect of a murder case.(n)

programme.title: Mother's Touch: Korean Side Dishes
programme.desc: A veteran actress and a master in the kitchen, Kim Su-mi shares her recipes with three chefs specialising in foreign cuisine, and teaches them the secrets of Korean home-cooking.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant On Wheels: China
programme.desc: Korean star chef Lee Yeon-bok is opening a food truck with Kim Kang-woo, Seo Eun-soo, Heo Kyung-hwan in China selling Korean-style Chinese cuisine! Will their dishes suit the locals' appetite?(n)

programme.title: 100 Days My Prince
programme.desc: Prince Lee Yul falls off a cliff and nearly dies in an assassination attempt. Having lost his memory, he wanders for 100 days under a new identity. He then meets Hong Sim, head of a detective agency in Joseon.(n)

programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim teaches you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes - from Italian pasta and Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!(n)

programme.desc: Yoo Jae-suk and 4 female hosts go to find the hottest places or people. However, among the places or people, there are fake ones and the hosts need to use their 'sixth sense' to identify the fake one.(n)
